description: I totally agree, I think Javascript is the best language to learn first.  It's easy to learn and you can do so much with it.  I'm currently learning React and it's been a lot of fun.  I'm looking forward to learning more about it.
You should try Ruby on Rails.  It's a great framework for building web apps.  I'm currently learning it and I'm really enjoying it.  I'm looking forward to learning more about it.
I enjoyed using the MVC method to build my first app. Once I got a grasp on the routing it was very intuitive.
